title: Sample Space
text: There are 8 total areas where the arrow can land on.

title: Landing on Green
text: There are 2 slices in the circle that the arrow can land on: the I and the F.

title: Landing on a Vowel
text: There are 4 slices in the circle that the arrow can land on: the A, I, E, O.

title: Landing on a Green Vowel
text: There is only 1 slice in the circle that the arrow can land on: the green I.

title: Probability of the Union of Two Events
text: Add the probablity of landing on a green and the probablity of landing on a vowel. Subtract the probability of landing on a slice that is both green and a vowel.
